metadata.name: Out-of-Distribution Physics Equation Benchmark
metadata.description: 20 hand-curated physics equations NOT in the Feynman Symbolic Regression Database, spanning Navier-Stokes, Schrodinger, Maxwell, thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, fluid dynamics, and electrostatics
metadata.purpose: Test generalization to genuinely unseen equation structures

equations.name: Stokes Drag Force
equations.source_citation: Stokes, G.G. (1851). On the effect of the internal friction of fluids on the motion of pendulums. Trans. Cambridge Phil. Soc. 9:8.

equations.name: 1D Time-Independent Schrodinger (Free Particle Energy)
equations.source_citation: Griffiths, D.J. (2018). Introduction to Quantum Mechanics, 3rd ed. Cambridge University Press, Eq. 2.27.

equations.name: Maxwell Displacement Current Density
equations.source_citation: Maxwell, J.C. (1865). A Dynamical Theory of the Electromagnetic Field. Phil. Trans. Royal Soc. 155:459-512.

equations.name: Clausius-Clapeyron Equation (Simplified)
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(div(x1, x2), div(1, sub(div(1, x3), div(1, x4))))
equations.source_citation: Clausius, R. (1850). Ueber die bewegende Kraft der Warme. Annalen der Physik 79:368-397.

equations.name: Bernoulli Equation (Pressure Form)
equations.formula_symbolic: add(x1, add(mul(div(1, 2), mul(x2, pow(x3, 2))), mul(x2, mul(x4, x5))))
equations.source_citation: Bernoulli, D. (1738). Hydrodynamica. Strasbourg.

equations.name: Helmholtz Free Energy
equations.source_citation: Helmholtz, H. von (1882). Die Thermodynamik chemischer Vorgange. Sitzungsberichte der Berliner Akademie.

equations.name: Quantum Harmonic Oscillator Energy Levels
equations.source_citation: Griffiths, D.J. (2018). Introduction to Quantum Mechanics, 3rd ed. Cambridge University Press, Eq. 2.62.

equations.name: Poiseuille Flow (Volume Flow Rate)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(pi, mul(pow(x1, 4), x2)), mul(mul(4, 2), mul(x3, x4)))
equations.source_citation: Poiseuille, J.L.M. (1846). Recherches experimentales sur le mouvement des liquides dans les tubes de tres-petits diametres. Comptes Rendus 11:961-967.

equations.name: Electric Dipole Potential
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(x1, cos(x2)), mul(mul(4, mul(pi, x3)), pow(x4, 2)))
equations.source_citation: Griffiths, D.J. (2017). Introduction to Electrodynamics, 4th ed. Cambridge University Press, Eq. 3.102.

equations.name: Gibbs Free Energy
equations.source_citation: Gibbs, J.W. (1876). On the Equilibrium of Heterogeneous Substances. Trans. Connecticut Acad. Arts Sci. 3:108-248.

equations.name: de Broglie Wavelength
equations.source_citation: de Broglie, L. (1924). Recherches sur la theorie des Quanta. PhD Thesis, Univ. Paris.

equations.name: Navier-Stokes Viscous Stress (1D Simplified)
equations.source_citation: Navier, C.L. (1822). Memoire sur les lois du mouvement des fluides. Mem. Acad. Sci. Inst. France 6:389-440.

equations.name: Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle (Minimum Product)
equations.source_citation: Heisenberg, W. (1927). Ueber den anschaulichen Inhalt der quantentheoretischen Kinematik und Mechanik. Z. Phys. 43:172-198.

equations.name: Reynolds Number
equations.source_citation: Reynolds, O. (1883). An experimental investigation of the circumstances which determine whether the motion of water shall be direct or sinuous. Phil. Trans. Royal Soc. 174:935-982.

equations.name: Magnetic Force on Moving Charge
equations.source_citation: Lorentz, H.A. (1895). Versuch einer Theorie der electrischen und optischen Erscheinungen in bewegten Korpern. Leiden: E.J. Brill.

equations.name: Stefan-Boltzmann Radiation Power
equations.source_citation: Stefan, J. (1879). Uber die Beziehung zwischen der Warmestrahlung und der Temperatur. Sitzungsberichte der Wiener Akademie 79:391-428.

equations.name: Relativistic Kinetic Energy
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(x1, mul(pow(x2, 2), sub(div(1, sqrt(sub(1, div(pow(x3, 2), pow(x2, 2))))), 1)))
equations.source_citation: Einstein, A. (1905). Zur Elektrodynamik bewegter Korper. Annalen der Physik 17:891-921.

equations.name: Debye Model Specific Heat (High-T Limit)
equations.source_citation: Debye, P. (1912). Zur Theorie der spezifischen Warmen. Annalen der Physik 39:789-839.

equations.name: Poisson Equation (1D Electrostatics)
equations.source_citation: Poisson, S.D. (1813). Remarques sur une equation qui se presente dans la theorie des attractions des spheroides. Nouveau Bull. Soc. Philomathique 3:388-392.

equations.name: Sackur-Tetrode Entropy (Simplified Partition)
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(x1, log(div(mul(x2, pow(div(mul(mul(2, pi), mul(x3, x4)), pow(x5, 2)), div(3, 2))), x1)))
equations.source_citation: Sackur, O. (1911). Die Anwendung der kinetischen Theorie der Gase auf chemische Probleme. Annalen der Physik 36:958-980.
